data.text:
APA Citation, 7th Edition (style guide)

Casson, L. (1967). Masters of ancient comedy: selections from: Aristophanes, Menander, Plautus, [and] Terence . Minerva Press.

Chicago / Turabian - Author Date Citation, 17th Edition (style guide)

Casson, Lionel, 1914-2009. 1967. Masters of Ancient Comedy: Selections From: Aristophanes, Menander, Plautus, [and] Terence. Minerva Press.

MLA Citation, 9th Edition (style guide)
